doctors.name: Prof. Dr. Shishir Basak
doctors.visit_time: Everyday from 4:30 PM to 9:30 PM (except Friday, Saturday & Govt. Holiday)
doctors.bio: Renowned cardiologist with 15+ years experience in advanced cardiac care. Specialist in preventive cardiology and complex interventions, providing comprehensive care for hypertension, heart failure, and coronary artery disease.
doctors.statement: I strive to deliver world-class cardiac care accessible to all, focusing on accurate diagnosis and sustainable heart health solutions.

doctors.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Nazrul Islam
doctors.visit_time: Everyday from 3:00 PM to 8:00 PM except Friday
doctors.bio: Leading neurophysician with expertise in managing complex neurological disorders including epilepsy, stroke, and movement disorders.
doctors.statement: Committed to providing patient-centered neurological care through cutting-edge diagnostics and evidence-based treatments.

doctors.name: Prof. Dr. Muhammad Shahabuddin
doctors.visit_time: Everyday from 3:00 PM to 10:00 PM except Friday
doctors.bio: Pioneer in interventional cardiology procedures with international training in complex angioplasty and structural heart interventions.
doctors.statement: Dedicated to bringing advanced cardiac interventions to our community while maintaining the highest safety standards.

appointment.call_hours: From 9:00 AM to 11:00 AM (From 7:00 PM to 10:00 PM for advance appointment)

doctors.name: Dr. Alamgir Chowdhury
doctors.bio: Expert in managing chronic kidney diseases, dialysis, and renal transplantation with focus on preventive nephrology.
doctors.statement: Believe in holistic approach to kidney health combining lifestyle modification with advanced medical therapies.

doctors.name: Dr. Rahat Amin Chowdhury
doctors.address: Kazi Tower, Samato-30, Chali Bandar, Bishwa Road, Subhani Ghat, Sylhet, 3100
doctors.bio: Specialist in neuro-electrophysiology and management of headache disorders, with particular interest in neuromuscular diseases.
doctors.statement: Committed to compassionate care for neurological conditions through accurate diagnosis and personalized treatment plans.

doctors.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Matiur Rahman
doctors.visit_time: Everyday from 11:00 AM to 01:00 PM except Friday & Monday
doctors.bio: Expert in cognitive neurology and neurorehabilitation, with special focus on dementia and neuro-degenerative disorders.
doctors.statement: Dedicated to improving quality of life through comprehensive neurological care and rehabilitation strategies.
